div.p:
School Hours:
Full Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 3:15 pm
Half Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 11:15 am
Grades 1-8 8:00 am – 3:15 pm

Early Release Schedule:
AM Preschool 8:15 am – 9:45 am
PM Preschool 10:30 am – 12:00 pm
Full Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 12:00 pm
Half Day Kindergarten 8:00 am – 10:00 am
Grades 1-8 8:00 am – 12:00 pm
